title: Veesum Kaatrukku Song Lyrics Ullasam
stanzas:
anbe unnai peyaraithaane
virumbi kaetkiren
pogum paadhai engum
unnai thirumbi paarkiren

ennaiye thiranthaval
yaar avalao
uyirile nulainthaval
yaar avalao
vazhiyai mariththaal
malarai koduthaal
mozhiyai parithaal
mounam koduthaal

anbe unnai peyaraithaane
virumbi kaetkiren
pogum paadhai engum
unnai thirumbi paarkiren

megam pole en
vaanil vanthavale
yaaro avalukku
neethaan ennavalae

mega mega megak koottam
nenjil kooduthae
undhan peyarai solli solli
minnal oaduthe
